Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest

Other Income (Expense): gain loss on disposition of assets1
income loss from equity method investments

Total Operating Expenses: operating expenses excluding depreciation and amortization

Diluted EPS: diluted earnings per share pro forma

Total Revenues: revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interests and dividends on redeemable subsidiary preferred stock
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interests and redeemable subsidiary preferred stock
operating costs and expenses excluding depreciation and amortization
